name: AGameplayCueNotify_BurstLatent
doc:
AGameplayCueNotify_BurstLatent

    This is an instanced gameplay cue notify for effects that are one-offs.
    Since it is instanced, it can do latent things like time lines or delays.

DefaultSpawnCondition: Default condition to check before spawning anything.  Applies for all spawns unless overridden.
DefaultPlacementInfo: Default placement rules.  Applies for all spawns unless overridden.
BurstEffects: List of effects to spawn on burst.
